text: Prepare everything. Wash the vegetables and the cilantro and peel the onion and the garlic. Chop the green tomato and the onion into medium chunks. They should be small enough to fit in the food processor. Cut the limes in half. Now, extract the juice. It is preferred you use a citrus juicer for this. Set aside. Prepare the jalapeño pepper. You may want to wear gloves for this if you have sensitive skin! Remove the pepper tops and chop in medium chunks that also fit in the food processor. Cut the stems from the cilantro. Put it in the food processor together with the pepper, onion, and garlic. Process on high until the mix is finely chopped and looks like a green paste.  Place the tomatoes in the food processor as well. Use the pulse feature on the machine until the tomatoes are finely cut, but not liquefied! Add the tequila, salt, cumin, and lemon juice. Give the food processor some quick pulses to mix it all. Pour into the serving bowl and done. Enjoy! Finished.
